name: Aztec Arena
description:
Keyboard Controls:

WASD to move, SPACE to Dodge, Left-Click to Attack towards mouse
X-Box/PS Controls:

Left Joystick Moves, Right Joystick Aims Spear
Left Triggers or X/A to Dodge, Right Triggers to Attack

Each round, the game gets harder. Co-op is encouraged, and is a lot of fun :D. Your spear lingers for a few seconds after attacking and will still kill enemies. You can cancel that lingering state by dashing. HAVE FUN!!!
